Joseph Muzondo (a mụrụ n'afọ 1953) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe.
N'ịbụ onye nwanne nna ya kụziiri ya n'ọrụ , Muzondo mechara sonye na National Gallery B.A.T
Ọ gụrụ maka imewe ákwà na Tanzania na eserese  nka na Austria, ma gosipụta ya n'ụwa niile
Ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta nke National Gallery of Zimbabwe
